newSaver(String) - Method in class org.klotski.graphics.Window

nextBestMove() - Method in class org.klotski.controller.BestMoveController
Function to make the next best move.
If the best possible move isn't allowed, it gives one random move.
It is preferable to call this function inline, for example:
